reviewComments: Although I don't drink - my customers do & this Gem in the Desert offers crafted beers that they love. October seems to be the month to stock up on special Octoberfest libations... read more
Although I am a beer snob, I didn't go for the beer. I took a group of kids who purchased a variety of different sodas, ranging from bacon flavored to classic cream soda and... read more
out of the way, but if you are in the area, worth stopping in and tasting all their beers
Seriously, there beers rock! You need to try death valley pale ale and amnesia IPA I was amazed at the rich taste of the beers.
